# vrobots

Helicopter

```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.helicopter.heli
```

Multirotor

```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.multirotor.multirotor
```

IMU0

```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.imu0.imu0
```

VRobot Bridge

```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.vrobots_bridge.vrobots_bridge_gui
```
